author: cbrzn
content: hey guys I am checking the documentation of the merge test plan (https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/merge-test-plan) and the link of `consensus-spec` here seems broken (sorry if this is not the right channel to say this, please let me know where I should comment these kind of things if this is not the correct place)

author: pietjepuk
content: it is indeed, https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/bellatrix is the new one.
